title: Huge problems with DQ
body: We need solo queue back, because DQ is ruining the game. Its no fun playing the game and having 3-5 of the enemy team members all in call with each other talking about what to do when its me and 4 random people having to communicate through pings it creates such an unfair advantage and makes it so i don't want to play the game. If we don't get a solution to DQ soon i will stop supporting Riot, no more watching lcs on their youtube/twitch etc i'll use others who upload afterwards so riot isent being supported by me and i suggest everyone else do the same until this problem is fixed.

replies.body: I just had a game where they had 3 man premade and we had all 1 man team. On top of that it seems that i will randomly get people on my team who are just so far down in elo compared to everyone else that it makes no sense to have them, like having a silver 3 on my team against a team of full gold 1-plat 5's, its an auto fed lane for whoever they are against.

This almost never happens (look at the stats riot posted on this very topic about a moth ago). Premades are matched against premades of the same size in virtually all games, and a 4-man is NEVER matched against 5 random solos.

Why blame bad games/teams on DQ?
